quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I remember, involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising everytime we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchhill

quotes.quote: I donâ€™t know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve.
quotes.author: Bilbo Baggins

quotes.quote: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: To be, or not to be, that is the question...
quotes.author: Jeffo

quotes.quote: Shall i compare thee to a sommers day?
quotes.author: Greg

quotes.quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
